subject: Attn:
body:
Attn:
We are in charge of Releasing payment of contractors from Africa/Asia
and Middle East including USA and Americas based on UN and World Bank
Directives.
Approval has been given for immediate Release of your long overdue contract sum.
You are hereby,directed to forward to us your details especially
banking details,contact telephone number(s) and any valid I.D. for
identification claims.
On receipt of the above,you will be invited to the United Kingdom or Amsterdam (Holland) to go and sign Release Order Documents and monitor transfers into your nominated bank account before departure.
Looking forward to your anticipated response.
Mr.Marc Hickson
SIRF GB GH .CORPORATION
Switzerland

subject: Re:   Attn:
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the process. Can you provide me with additional details on how the payment will be processed and what steps I need to take next?

Best wishes,
Alana

subject: Mr.Alana
body:
Your mail noted.confirm your full details,your banking details,contact
telephone number(s),your occupation and home or office address.
With the above requirements,your payment will be processed for immediate
transfer.
Regards,
Marc Hickson

subject: Re: Mr.Alana
body:
Hello Marc, thank you for reaching out. Could you please provide more details about the payment process and why this information is needed? I want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Alana

subject: Dear Mr.Alana
body:
Attn Mr.Alana,

You are welcomed by your enquiries.As soon as you provide the
requirements,our payment office will forward their office address and
contact telephone number(s) for immediate contact and subsequent invitation
to sign Release documents and monitor transfers before your departure.
The major issue is your willingness to embrace the appointment with the
office.
Let us have the requirements as earlier requested.
Regards,
Marc Hickson.

subject: Re: Dear Mr.Alana
body:
Hello Marc, thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the process. Could you please provide me with some details on how to proceed with the payment and what steps are involved in signing the Release documents? Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Alana
